Title: Legs From Here to Homeworld
Writer: Miki Brewster, Matt Burnett (story), Joseph D. Johnston (story), Ben Levin (story), Jeff Liu, Katie Mitroff, Kat Morris (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Paul Villeco
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: After managing to convince Blue and Yellow Diamond of his true identity, Steven tries to get them to repair the gems they damaged. But in order to do this, they must seek help from a peculiar ally back on Homeworld.
